post_title: Goode Deal or No Goode Deal - It's up to you
post_content:
[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/53764/clarke-portrait[/IMG]

[IMG]https://www.collectorfocus.com/images/show/frankbmd/t206-sgc/61137/goode[/IMG]

Fred, the HOFer, in his portrait pose VG+ asking $OLD (SGC 3.5) 

Wilber ready to knock it out of the park EX+ asking $189  (SGC 5.5)

or take them both for $400;)   PPFF strongly preferred.  Thanks in advance.

Prompt Free Shipping.
These cards have been slashed, but the slabs were not damaged.  Only the asking prices suffered.  Take another look.:eek:

You probably didn't know that Wilbur was born in Punxsutawney, PA, but not on Groundhog Day.  He is not related to a groundhog either, but any claim you might want to make about him would be difficult to refute.

Don't pass up a goode deal on Wilbur's T206 beauty.
Apparently there is no interest in a goode deal.
